Package reskue.usergroup

Class UserGroupController

java.lang.Object
kueres.base.BaseController<UserGroupEntity,​UserGroupRepository,​UserGroupService>
reskue.usergroup.UserGroupController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/userGroup")
public class UserGroupController
extends kueres.base.BaseController<UserGroupEntity,​UserGroupRepository,​UserGroupService>
The UserGroupController provides API functions for UserGroupEntities. These functions are: - all functions of the BaseController in kueres.base - finding all users of a user group - adding a user to a user group - removing a user from a user group
Since:
Mar 25, 2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jan Strassburg, jan.strassburg@student.kit.edu

  • Method Details

    • getAllUsers

      @GetMapping("/{id}/users") @RolesAllowed({"administrator","helper"}) public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<UserEntity> getAllUsers​(@PathVariable("id") java.lang.Long id, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.String[]> filter, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.String[]> sort, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> page, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> size)
      Find all users that are part of the user group. The result can filtered, sorted and paged.

      See kueres.query.SearchCriteria for filter syntax.

      See kueres.query.SortBuilder for sort syntax.

      Parameters:
      id - - the user groups's identifier.
      filter - - the filter options.
      sort - - the sort options.
      page - - the number of the page used for pagination.
      size - - the size of the page used for pagination.
      Returns:
      The result as a page.

    • getNotifications

      @GetMapping("/notifications") @RolesAllowed({"administrator","helper"}) public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<NotificationEntity> getNotifications​(@RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.Long[]> ids, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.String[]> filter, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.String[]> sort, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> page, @RequestParam java.util.Optional<java.lang.Integer> size)
      Find all notifications that the users of the user groups should receive. The result can filtered, sorted and paged.

      See kueres.query.SearchCriteria for filter syntax.

      See kueres.query.SortBuilder for sort syntax.

      Parameters:
      ids - - the identifiers of all the user group that are being searched.
      filter - - the filter options.
      sort - - the sort options.
      page - - the number of the page used for pagination.
      size - - the size of the page used for pagination.
      Returns:
      The result as a page.

    • addUser

      @PutMapping("/{id_user_group}/addUser/{id_user}") @RolesAllowed("administrator") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserGroupEntity> addUser​(@PathVariable("id_user_group") java.lang.Long id, @PathVariable("id_user") java.lang.Long userId)
      Adds a user to the user group.
      Parameters:
      id - - the user groups's identifier.
      userId - - the user's identifier.
      Returns:
      The user group after the user was added.

    • removeUser

      @PutMapping("/{id_user_group}/removeUser/{id_user}") @RolesAllowed("administrator") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserGroupEntity> removeUser​(@PathVariable("id_user_group") java.lang.Long id, @PathVariable("id_user") java.lang.Long userId)
      Removes a user from the user group.
      Parameters:
      id - - the user groups's identifier.
      userId - - the user's identifier.
      Returns:
      The user group after the user was removed.
